Header.title: Stop medication waste. Save lives.
Header.paragraph: Be Part Of A Donor Society

About.paragraph: Donating to the causes you care about not only benefits the charities themselves, it can be deeply rewarding for you too. In India, various studies have shown the rising out-of-pocket expenditures on healthcare is pushing around 32-39 million Indians below the poverty line annually. Too many Indian citizens do not get access to medicines owing to high costs. By donating unwanted or unused medicines instead of throwing them away, you can save someone's life.

Features.title: Help your community
Features.text: Expand your influence beyond your organization and help others in need.

Features.title: Save Money
Features.text: Medication destruction is time consuming and costly for any organization. MEDONOR allows you to donate your unused medication for free.

Features.title: Help the environment
Features.text: Medication destruction pollutes waterways with pharmaceutical runoff, and releases toxic dioxins into the air.

Features.title: Feel complete confidence
Features.text: You will be provided with all the details of the donation and the beneficiaries.
